title: Requirements Document - Simple Multi-Agent Orchestration
response:
Feedback Summary (2 comments):

General Comments:
1. Should I create other agents project, such as agent-artist, agent-programmer, agent-designer for you?
2. shrimp-AGENTS mcp server should be in kadi-broker's C:\p4\Personal\SD\kadi\kadi-broker\config\mcp-upstreams.json. Actually, that should probably be shrimp-agent-playground since we're already using shrimp-AGENTS for "C:\p4\Personal\SD\AGENTS" and agents can be doing their stuff in "C:\p4\Personal\SD\agent-playground". By the way, I forgot to mention, when agents working together, they should be using gitworktree, they should create their working directory at "C:\p4\Personal\SD\agent-playground-artist", "C:\p4\Personal\SD\agent-playground-designer", "C:\p4\Personal\SD\agent-playground-programmer", so that they can work concurrently

comments.comment: Should I create other agents project, such as agent-artist, agent-programmer, agent-designer for you?

shrimp-AGENTS mcp server should be in kadi-broker's C:\p4\Personal\SD\kadi\kadi-broker\config\mcp-upstreams.json. Actually, that should probably be shrimp-agent-playground since we're already using shrimp-AGENTS for "C:\p4\Personal\SD\AGENTS" and agents can be doing their stuff in "C:\p4\Personal\SD\agent-playground". By the way, I forgot to mention, when agents working together, they should be using gitworktree, they should create their working directory at "C:\p4\Personal\SD\agent-playground-artist", "C:\p4\Personal\SD\agent-playground-designer", "C:\p4\Personal\SD\agent-playground-programmer", so that they can work concurrently
